query:
SELECT 
                number as batch_number,
                eth_txs.chain_id as settlement_layer_id,
                eth_txs_history.tx_hash as settlement_layer_tx_hash
            FROM 
                l1_batches
            JOIN 
                eth_txs ON l1_batches.eth_execute_tx_id = eth_txs.id
            JOIN 
                eth_txs_history ON (eth_txs.id = eth_txs_history.eth_tx_id AND eth_txs_history.confirmed_at IS NOT NULL)
            WHERE 
                l1_batches.number = $1
